title: The Musician as Content Creator with Marianna Ritchey
itunes:title: The Musician as Content Creator with Marianna Ritchey
description:
Now that Samuel Beckett's "Fail Better" is a motivational poster in some Silicon Valley bro's office, what is the value of art in the neoliberal age? And is it possible to still create art -- rather than just Content -- with the pressures of branding, the anxiety of audience, and the crippling of the industry? Jessa talks to Marianna Ritchey about her book Composing Capital and the state of the arts on the market.

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual

http://jessacrispin.com
